item.description:
Sooo how's about a hike on Sunday. Nothing too early, so it shouldnt be too chilly. And abiding to the ethos of incorporating food into every event, there will be the option of food after the hike.

Hike:
Let's meet at Middlesex fells "Skating Pond" parking lot at 1pm. The hike is around the Rock Circuit trail for an est time of 1.5-2ish hours. The terrain is a pretty rough, so boots wouldn't be a bad idea. Don't forget water.

Food:
Afterwards we can head to Olde Magouns Saloon for food and beers. Their chili effin awesome, IMO. The address is 518 medford st, somerville, MA‎

Massages:
then to finish the event off with a bang i'll be inviting jose and the entire The New England M4M Full Body Massage Exchange Group to give us all rubdowns afterwards... just kidding

Skating pond parking lot

map of Olde Magouns
item.name: Rocky hike, food (&beer) and massages
